definition: water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
capacity/quantity/amount/to estimate/abbr. for 量詞|量词[liang4 ci2], classifier (in Chinese grammar)/measure word

sentences.english: The serum MBP and moisture in brain tissues were observed as index.
sentences.chinese: 以血清MBP和脑组织含水量作为观察指标。

sentences.english: Add the correct amount of water and reassemble the percolator.
sentences.chinese: 添加正确的水量和组装的过滤器。

sentences.english: The higher the anode is humidified , the more water will migrate from anode to cathode.
sentences.chinese: 阳极增湿程度越大，由阳极向阴极迁移的水量越多。

sentences.english: Changle over mountain rivers flowing through hilly, water development, water rich.
sentences.chinese: 长乐以上，河流经丘陵山区，水系发育，水量丰富。

sentences.english: Out of those three, one has steady levels of water.
sentences.chinese: 这三个中的一个已经有稳定的水量。

sentences.english: High lift pump , but water is not applicable to.
sentences.chinese: 离心泵扬程较高，但出水量不大，适用于。

sentences.english: But in the sandy land, the change tendency of the soil moisture content is opposite to the clay land.
sentences.chinese: 而在沙土地，土壤含水量的变化趋势与黏土地相反。

sentences.english: The microbial degradation of BHC was remarkably influenced by the soluble oxygen in flooded soil.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为含水量影响了微生物呼吸活性所致。

sentences.english: Some ancient cities had two to three times as much water per person as many cities today.
sentences.chinese: 某些古代城市每人的用水量是今日许多城市的两三倍。

sentences.english: This is because the water content of fresh day lily have Colchicine can cause poisoning.
sentences.chinese: 这是因为鲜黄花菜中含水量有秋水仙碱，会引起中毒。

sentences.english: The best conditions for the weeds germination were saturation soil moisture to thin layer water.
sentences.chinese: 土壤含水量饱和至薄水层最有利于萌发。

sentences.english: She started drinking a lot more water. And no soda, not even the diet kind.
sentences.chinese: 她开始加大饮水量，不喝汽水，即便是无糖汽水。

sentences.english: Temperature and precipitation levels have influenced many major events in history.
sentences.chinese: 气温和降水量对历史上的许多重大事件产生过影响。

sentences.english: The water potential of embryo was positively correlated with its moisture content.
sentences.chinese: 番茄种胚水势与含水量的关系呈幂指数的正相关。

sentences.english: The power is calculated and model is selected by water treatment amounts and turbid degree of inlet and outlet of water.
sentences.chinese: 通过实际处理水量与进出水浊度计算功率和选型。

sentences.english: A city's yearly water consumption is a homogeneous Markov chain.
sentences.chinese: 城市年用水量是一个齐次马尔可夫链。

definition: sand content/quantity of sediment (carried by a river)
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
Qingshui (place name)/Shimizu (Japanese surname and place name)
water source/water supply/headwaters of a river
